content: *chain 1 skip to next chain space 3 double_crochet into that space repeat from * for the rest of this row row 2 chain 4 skip 3 sts *3 double_crochet into next previous chain space chain 1 skip to next chain space repeat from * until you have 3 sts left in this row chain 1 skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet into the last st of this row alternate between row 1 & 2 on each long side of your rectangle for however long you want your project charming rectangle afghan i have this free pattern on my blog here playlist featuring more free blanket tutorials here follow crochet me lovely on all social media @crochetmelovely if you want to learn new stitches and techniques subscribe to my youtube channel here find more patterns on my blog here if you have any questions about this pattern email me at crochetmelovely@yahoo com thank you for downloading this pattern enjoy charming rectangle afghan
